tool_description: Get latest huge crypto transactions for most popular blockchains
name: Crypto Whale Transactions
title: Crypto Whale Transactions

api_list.name: Blockchains
api_list.description: Get list of all supported blockchains
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-whale-transactions.p.rapidapi.com/v1/blockchain/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-whale-transactions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-whale-transactions.p.rapidapi.com/v1/blockchain/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-whale-transactions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

api_list.name: Transactions feed
api_list.description:
Get latest huge whale transactions for most popular blockchains.

**Filter by txn value. Add parameters as below:**
<_amount_usd=10000 
OR
>amount_usd=10000

**Filter by blockchain:**
 t_blockchain=bitcoin

Available blockchains: bitcoin, bitcoin-cash, ethereum, bitcoin-sv, litecoin, tron, ripple, zcash, dogecoin, neo, eos, dash, ethereum-classic, tezos, binancechain, stellar, groestlcoin, icon, steem, cosmos, decred, verge, hypercash, siacoin


**Pagination:**
Add parameter: size=100

api_list.name: Specific transactions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-whale-transactions.p.rapidapi.com/v2/tx/btc/ac6f1a0b388e2814f2e2036c7c81524cfae7e3432a8e503fe5d07ebb453ee310"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-whale-transactions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-whale-transactions.p.rapidapi.com/v2/tx/{symbol}/{hash}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-whale-transactions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
